recipesJson.name: Tickly Victory
recipesJson.author: amouthforwar
recipesJson.description: Went off of Hash's idea for Prickly Victory (guava + cactus) and whipped up a simple passionfruit. Trying to stay true to the concept. Barebones. Clean flavor. SNV. Bit of a throat scratch from the Passion fruit but it's the only one I've got right now D:
